audio.wayfinding: Stuart Street at Charles Street South

evergreen_content.text_for_audio: No Green Line trains between North Station and Heath Street, Kenmore, and Babcock St, from November 27-December 5 for tunnel inspections. Find alternative routes at  mbta.com/GreenLine
